column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is the real deal Spanish tapas. Rockin' Friday night without reservations 90 minute wait! We hawked a bar table and got lucky because the place was packed--and it's huge! Food is amazing. Be warned that veggie paella takes 40 minutes
column2: minimum two people for that dish. Sangria was awesome. Get the olives for sure
column4: and tortilla de patatas. Best meal in Chicago by far!!
